Description:
A Great Deal for a Smart Buyer!
Along with an increase in popularity comes an increase in prices...so a word to the wise is buy now!!!!
The Officer postcode is in demand as it offers convenient transport links to the Cardinia Road Train Station, M1 Freeway as well as the area's newest schools and trendiest shopping, restaurants and cafes.
Only four years young this modern four bedroom home offers buyers the opportunity to snap up a property in this area of high demand at an affordable price.
There is a main living zone which incorporates family living and dining areas and a Chef's kitchen complete with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and 900mm freestanding oven and cooktop.
The master bedroom offers walk in robe and ensuite, while remaining bedrooms have built in robes. With neutral tones throughout added features include double remote garage with direct entry, ducted heating, split system air conditioner and fibre optics.
An undercover alfresco entertaining area caters for outdoor entertaining and the good sized 448m2 low maintenance yard offers scope to add your own finishing touches or additions.
This home is ready for a new owner now. So hurry to avoid disappointment!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
Build Your Dream Home Now – Titled Block In Officer
This is a fantastic opportunity for someone that's ready to build a 2 storey home on a 519SQM approx. block in Officer. Positioned brilliantly in the established sector of this growth corridor, this block offers a 16m frontage and 32m boundary depth and is surrounded by quality homes. This location offers easy and quick access to shops, schools, the freeway and Cardinia or Officer Train station.
Do not delay, call to register your interest immediately.

Description:
MODERN & COMPLETE FAMILY LIVING IN ARENA
Offering exceptional family friendly features on a generous scale, this quality built open plan Porter Davis home is impressive at every level promoting comfort and relaxation. Only 4 & 1/2 years young on a block size of approx. 511sqm, positioned in the heart of one of the highest growth corridors in the south-east region, this beautifully presented home awaits its new owner.
Features comprise of:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, plus study, Master has his and hers WIR, a very spacious ensuite with twin vanities and oversized shower
- Superb kitchen, stone benches and glass splashbacks, large WIP, 900mm stainless steel appliances, Blanco dishwasher
- 3 large living rooms plus your choice of 2 outdoor covered Alfresco areas to relax with family and friends giving extra space for dining options all year round.
Extras include, ducted heating, split system cooling, porcelain tiles, high ceilings, timber bi-folds to the Alfresco, double garage with remote and internal access, garden shed with low maintenance fully landscaped front and back yards, setting the tone for this outstanding family entertainer. Absolutely nothing to do but move in and enjoy!
Location is perfect - walking distance to the Arena Shopping Plaza and cafes, a short drive to the Cardinia train station and Monash freeway, surrounded by public and private schools, why look anywhere else? Don't delay, call Michael or Brenda for your inspection today!

Description:
Near new Officer delight!
Presented for sale with all the class and quality you could ask for is this immaculate Officer delight.
Comprising 2 large open living spaces and quality appliances this near new property presents huge value.
The generous master is located in the centre of the home with private ensuite and walk in robe and two remaining bedrooms with built in robes are serviced by the main bathroom.
The Modern kitchen is the heart of the home and is suitable for the most serious of chefs with Caesar stone benches, stainless steel oven and even includes a walk in pantry!
A double remote garage, ducted heating and evaporative cooling top off the list of must have conveniences.
Easy low maintenance landscaped gardens with a pergola ready for all the summer bbqs!
Set in a quiet location close to schools, shops, public transport and M1 access just a stone’s throw away convenience is at your doorstep!
Call today to arrange a time to inspect!

Description:
Parklands & Potential
Sale by Negotiation
Located in the Timbertop Estate, on the north side of Officer, is this 448m2 (approx.) rectangular block that is positioned opposite what will become future parklands as part of the Timbertop Master Plan. This block is titled and ready to build on, waiting for an astute buyer to take advantage of a premier location and what is sure to be fantastic views of marvellous parklands. The estate is establishing fast and is already filling with quality homes, proving to be a popular destination. Timbertop Estate provides great access to many private and public schools as well as many shopping precincts including Beaconsfield Village and the Arena Shopping Centre and is a short 3km drive to the Monash Freeway. Don't miss this opportunity to build your new home in this ideal location. Call now for further information.
Calum Dabb : 0400 273 535

Description:
BANK IT NOW, IT'S A BURBANK IN OFFICER!
Nest or invest but don't delay....
If you're looking for a bankable investment property or want a near new home to enjoy, this Burbank built 22SQ approx. house completed in 2015 is a must see. Positioned within the exploding Cardinia Shire, this Officer location ensures you're well positioned to capitalise on the staggering projected growth for this region. Add to this, close proximity to the Cardinia Road Train Station and shops, with instant access to the Monash Freeway and you have a remarkable opportunity.
This well-proportioned home offers 4 bedrooms combined with 2 living areas, on a low maintenance fully fenced block. The front lounge caters for guests or any gaming needs, while the main family area is open plan with double sliding doors to an alfresco. The kitchen features Caesar stone, 90cm Westinghouse freestanding cooker, dishwasher, breakfast bar and pantry storage. Flooring is hard wearing timber laminate from the front door to the back, while bedrooms and first living have the warmth of carpet. The master bedroom comes complete with walk in robe and ensuite, while the remaining bedrooms all have double built in robes and share the main bathroom.
This up to the minute design has downlights throughout, gas ducted heating, EVAP cooling, double remote garage with internal access and 6 Star energy rating for an efficient and comfortable home.
Call immediately to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Your New Aspect!
Sale by Negotiation
Located in the Aspect Estate of Officer is this 420m2 (approx.) corner block which offers you the ideal site to build your new family home. This block is titled and ready to build on, waiting for an astute buyer to take advantage of the site which also offers a 20m frontage and two crossovers. Aspect Estate provides great access to schools and shops in both the Officer and Pakenham area and has convenient access to the Princes Highway, Cardinia Road Train Station and the Monash Freeway. Don't miss this opportunity to build your new home in this ideal location. Call now for further information.
Calum Dabb : 0400 273 535

Description:
Spacious Family Home for Entertainers
UNDER CONTRACT
Modern convenience is at your fingertips within this designer family home. The master bedroom offers a large his/hers walk in robe and spacious full ensuite complete with spa bath and oversized shower. The additional three bedrooms are generously proportioned and all have their own built in robes. The home boasts 3 internal living zones including formal, family and media retreat upstairs and in addition, leading off the family living area is an alfresco with feature gas fire place for outdoor entertaining. The kitchen presents all stainless steel appliances including a 900mm oven, stone bench tops and a butler's pantry. Stay comfortable all year round with ducted heating and cooling. Low maintenance gardens complete this very desirable package. Enjoy family living at its best but don't delay, homes like this are not available for long.

Description:
Corner block in superb location
This corner block is located in Officer in the Aspect estate on the corner of Crimson Street and Cerise Street. It is very conveniently located close to the Cardinia Road Train Station, and close to schools and shopping in both Officer and Pakenham. It has two crossovers giving you the choice of having a garage at the front or back. Ideal square block which allows for a traditional style family home. Builders are happy to modify house plans to accommodate a wide short block. See sample of 3 bdrm plus study house plan. Take advantage of this great opportunity.

Description:
ONE OF GRANDVUE'S FINEST HOMES
FEAST YOUR EYES ON THIS, Only 3 year's young a home of this standard and outstanding attributes is rare to find. Jaw dropping facade and gardens greet you on arrival in what sets the tone for this Premium Home, with 4 bedrooms plus a study nook, the deluxe master suite with oversize walk in robe & superior ensuite with dual vanities and large shower.
Living space is equally as spacious throughout and with 3 separate spaces made up of fully furnished luxury home cinema, central family room and a rumpus/children retreat space will provide adequate space for all the family.
Kitchen with an abundance of storage draws/cupboards, Caesar stone bench tops, 900ml stainless oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher and impressive walk in pantry, additionally opening up to the alfresco which is fully decked extremely private and landscaped to perfection also containing built in 6 burner BBQ ideal for entertaining.
Features of the home are extensive and include multi zoned gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling for total comfort in all climates, 4.5kw solar inverter with 12 panels, home security system, beautiful spotted gum timber flooring, 9ft ceiling height, 6.9 sq garage fitted with storage cupboards, work bench and further internal and rear roller door access.
Perfectly designed home for the block ensures great use of space all round, set in the popular Grandvue Estate adjacent from park and walking distance to Arena shopping centre, St Francis college and easy freeway access from Cardinia Road.

Description:
The Beginning of an Ample Opportunity
If you’ve been keeping an eye on the current market as of late, you will know that interest rates are at an all-time low. If you’ve been to Officer lately, you’ll know that this location is one of the top growth corridors in Victoria right now.
Officer is the place to be, here is your golden opportunity to leap into the market with this property of endless potential.
Presented For Sale is number 5 Hampshire street Officer, a home comprising of four bedrooms and two bathrooms and a double lock up remote garage, featuring a private, flat backyard that is perfectly suited to an investor, a first home buyer or a growing family.
The property has a quaint and easily maintainable front yard, as well as a small concreted sitting area appealing to those who like the outdoors without the maintenance. The location is close to shops, schools, nearby parks and train station, as well as boasting easy access to the Monash Freeway.
A property with this many ticked boxes, doesn’t come along often.
You can expect all the usual perks of a quality home, two living areas, and good sized bedrooms with built in robes, ensuite and walk in robe to the main. Ducted heating and split system cooling as standard, as well as ceiling fans for air circulation.
The kitchen is perfectly suited to the home and utilises the opportunity for entertaining guests as it adjoins the family meals area and has access to the backyard. You will find gas cooking, island benchtop and a dishwasher as well as an oversized fridge cavity with additional shelf storage above. There is also a separate double pantry providing plenty of storage space.
This property is the opportunity to make something your own, it is a blank canvas waiting for you to convert open living space to your needs.
Call Nicola to discuss an appointment to view this home today, strong market conditions predict this ample opportunity to be snapped up quickly.

Description:
BRILLIANT DESIGN, PRIME LOCATION – OFFICER!
Charming, private and welcoming awaits..
If you've done your homework and know the value of buying in growth corridors, this 23SQ approx. Porter Davis home demands your attention. For the savvy investor, first home buyer, family or downsizer, the Officer Postcode presents an opportunity not to be missed. Nestled on a 400SQM approx. flat block with easy access to the local Arena Shopping Village, Princes Highway, Monash Freeway and your choice of 2 train stations, this property ticks all the location criteria.
Completed in 2012, the character and charm of this home is evident immediately, with plantation shutters in the front windows and a wide and welcoming entrance that draws you inside. Flooring is both attractive and functional, with a mix of timber laminate floors in high traffic zones, carpet in the bedrooms and tile in the wet areas. The modern floorplan sees the master bedroom conveniently located at the rear, complete with walk in robe and ensuite. The front bedroom is ideally designed with guests or a student in mind as it flows through the study, rumpus and bathroom, providing solitude when required.
The main living area is open plan and great for entertaining with a kitchen that offers stone benches, breakfast bar, 90cm freestanding cooker, glass splashback, dishwasher, WIP and feature lighting for a contemporary finish. Outside the pergola is timber decked and the privacy screens and landscaped rear gardens will help you relax at the end of your busy day.
Inclusions: Gas ducted heating, A/C cooling and a double remote garage with internal access.
Don't miss this compelling property, call now to arrange your immediate inspection.

Description:
WHEN ONLY THE BEST WILL DO!!!
This brand new 39sq (approx.) architectural masterpiece delivers exceptional family living with its captivating spaces!!
With its free flowing design and luxurious appointments throughout, this fabulous two level abode provides an idyllic indoor/outdoor lifestyle is ideal for the growing family in an exceptional location of Officer!! This incredible versatile floor plan showcases:
Grand Master bedroom with his and hers WIR with full ensuite. Ultra-modern main bathroom with spa and separate toilet. Generous size bathroom and powder room for guests. Elegant formal lounge and dining areas.
Enter into the home with staircase leading to the upper level you will discover 4 spacious bedrooms, with large rumpus/teenagers retreat zone. To the lower level offering formal living, with a theatre room/ 5th bedroom, further formal and informal living areas.
On to the central living hub of the home and perfect your culinary skills in this well equipped kitchen with Caesar stone top Island bench, also featuring a spacious pantry, 900ml stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and so much more.
This functional floor plan surrounds the inner and outer living, complete to entertaining your guests all year round. Opening up with Bifold door, leading from the kitchen to the outdoor alfresco making this magnificent home ideal indoor/outdoor living at its finest.
Heating and refrigerated cooling, 6.5 energy rating, double glazed Windows and only a short drive to shops, schools and public transport.
Nestled in the prestigious Officer community, offering both luxury and comfort; blended together in this beautiful two-story home now selling.
Insights: 20 Nature Avenue, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.
